Basic:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { Splitter, SplitterPanel, SplitterResizeTrigger } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const size = ref([
  { id: 'a', size: 50 },
  { id: 'b', size: 50 },
])
</script>

<template>
  <Splitter :size="size">
    <SplitterPanel id="a">A</SplitterPanel>
    <SplitterResizeTrigger id="a:b" />
    <SplitterPanel id="b">B</SplitterPanel>
  </Splitter>
</template>
Events:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { Splitter, SplitterPanel, SplitterResizeTrigger } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const size = ref([
  { id: 'a', size: 50 },
  { id: 'b', size: 50 },
])
</script>

<template>
  <Splitter
    :size="size"
    on-resize-start="() => console.log('onResizeStart')"
    on-resize-end="() => console.log('onResizeEnd')"
  >
    <SplitterPanel id="a">A</SplitterPanel>
    <SplitterResizeTrigger id="a:b" />
    <SplitterPanel id="b">B</SplitterPanel>
  </Splitter>
</template>
Vertical:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { Splitter, SplitterPanel, SplitterResizeTrigger } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const size = ref([
  { id: 'a', size: 50 },
  { id: 'b', size: 50 },
])
</script>

<template>
  <Splitter :size="size" orientation="vertical">
    <SplitterPanel id="a">A</SplitterPanel>
    <SplitterResizeTrigger id="a:b" />
    <SplitterPanel id="b">B</SplitterPanel>
  </Splitter>
</template>
